1.0.name: wordpress/hiddenmedia
1.0.description:
Allows you to hide images or flash animations from the main posts list. The images are shown on the single post page (single.php) of course. This is especially handy if you want noisy flash animations hidden from the main page but shown on the post itself.

Features

  • Easy installation
  • Use Shortcodes from WP
  • Flexible syntax
  • Works with tinyMCE
  • Accepts jpg/jpeg/gif/bmp/png/ico/swf/tiff files
